description: PURIFIER CARTIDGE 100 Units. Items will be Delivered at CFB Halifax Nova Scotia or CFB Esquimalt, and Victoria , British Columbia
tags: Notification evaluation by multiple actual and postal address of local fire station awards
full_summary:
## Tender Notice
### Request for Proposal
#### Solicitation Number: W8482-241800/A
Date Published: 2023-06-28
Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-13T14:00:00

**Contact Information**
* Neil Troudale, Department of National Defence
	+ Email: [neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca](mailto:neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (613) 992-4581

**Document Attachments**
* [English RFP Clauses (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6753/w8482-241800---english-rfp-clauses.pdf)
* [French RFP Clauses (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6753/w8482-241800---fr-rfp-clauses.pdf)

**Tender Description**
The Department of National Defence invites bidders to propose a request for proposal for the procurement of Cartridges, Purifiers, as per the attached bid documents.

**Procurement Details**
* NSN: 01-4607980
* Quantity: Up to 225 cartridges (100 each for CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt)
* Units of issue: Each (EA)
* Languages of Bid: English or French

**Delivery Locations**
* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Conditions of Tender**
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars
* Equivalent or substitute products must be clearly identified
* Bidders must meet national security screening requirements

The Procuring Entity reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

The  tender closes on the specified date and time. Only valid bids received by the Buyer will be considered.

**Classification**
* Military Services and National Defence (92110000)
* Acquisition Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Note: I tried to keep the original text format, except for the sectioning and formatting to follow markdown guidelines. Any changes were kept minimal and only to improve readability and accuracy. I removed redundant information and tried to group similar details together. I also used headings and bullet points where
